label: A17B4_cF420_216_a6efg4h_2efg-001
title: Li$_{17}$Pb$_{4}$ Structure
comments: (Goward, 2001) propose this as a replacement for the \href{current_web_home_dir/A22B5_cF432_196_abcd6efg4h_2efg-001}{Li$_{22}$Si$_{5}$ structure}.  The change in stoichiometry is accounted for by placing extra lithium atoms on the the (4c) site $(1/4 1/4 1/4)$ and an additional (16e) site $(x x x)$, adjusting the stoichiometry to fit Li$_{21}$M$_{5}$ or Li$_{22}$M$_{5}$ as needed.  Phase diagrams quoted in (Villars, 2018) support this change.
